skills.name: Damnation
skills.blurb: Thresh can harvest the souls of enemies that die near him, permanently granting him Armor and Ability Power.
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} Enemy {{tip|champion|champions}}, large {{tip|minion|minions}} and large {{tip|monster|monsters}} that die near '''Thresh''' drop a ''Soul'' for 8 seconds. Epic monsters drop 2 ''Souls'' instead. Small minions and lesser monsters have a {{fd|33.{{recurring|33}}}}% chance to drop a ''Soul''.
'''Thresh''' autonomously collects ''Souls'' near him or a placed {{ai|Dark Passage|Thresh}}.
Each collected ''Soul'' grants '''Thresh''' {{sti|ap|{{as|{{fd|0.75}} ability power}}}} and {{sti|armor|{{as|{{fd|0.75}} '''bonus''' armor}}}}.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Innate: Enemy champions, large minions and large monsters that die near Thresh drop a Soul for 8 seconds. Epic monsters drop 2 Souls instead. Small minions and lesser monsters have a 33.Unknown value: recurring / 33% chance to drop a Soul.
Thresh autonomously collects Souls near him or a placed Thresh's Dark Passage.
Each collected Soul grants Thresh 0.75 ability power and 0.75 bonus armor.
skills.notes:
* ''Souls'' grant a small area of {{tip|sight}}.
* ''Souls'' are visible to allies and only become visible to enemies if their team has {{tip|sight}} of '''Thresh'''.
* The probability for ''souls'' dropping from small minions and monster on {{tip|Summoner's Rift}} starts at 33% but adjusts dynamically to match the expected quota of ''souls'' dropped (lowers if above, rises if below, remains if even). ''Souls'' collected are not considered when adjusting the probability.
* The maximum amount of ''souls'' '''Thresh''' can collect is 999,999, granting him {{as|749,999 '''bonus''' ability power}} and {{as|749,999 '''bonus''' armor}} ({{fd|99.99}}% damage reduction, reduced to {{fd|99.98}}% when hit by {{ii|Last Whisper}}).
* {{ci|Nunu|Nunu & Willump}} drop a soul each.

skills.name: Death Sentence
skills.effect_radius: {{tt|Global|For the stun and pulling}} / {{tt|3000|For being able to cast Deathly Leap; estimated}}
skills.blurb: Thresh binds an enemy in chains and pulls them toward him. Activating this ability a second time pulls Thresh to the enemy.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Thresh''' throws out his scythe in the target direction, becoming unable to move or attack while it is in flight.

The scythe catches the first enemy it hits, dealing them {{as|magic damage}}, {{tip|stun|stunning}} them for {{fd|1.5}} seconds, and ''hooking'' the target for {{fd|1.5}} seconds, during which the target is {{tip|true sight|revealed}} and '''Thresh''' is unable to declare basic attacks. Hitting an enemy reduces the {{sti|cooldown}} of ''Death Sentence'' by 3 seconds and {{tip|slow|slows}} '''Thresh''' by 20% for 1 second.

While the target is {{tip|stun|stunned}}, '''Thresh''' tugs at his scythe's chain twice over {{fd|0.8}} seconds, {{tip|airborne|pulling}} the target a short distance towards himself with each tug. After {{fd|0.5}} seconds of hitting an enemy or instantly after hitting a {{tip|minion}} or {{tip|monster}}, '''Thresh''' can recast the ability to cast ''Deathly Leap'' while the target is ''hooked'', doing so will cause him to stop tugging.

{{sbc|Recast:}} '''Thresh''' {{tip|dash|dashes}} to the ''hooked'' enemy within range, becoming able to attack again upon arrival. '''Thresh''' can cast any of his [[champion ability|abilities]] while in flight with the exception of {{ai|The Box|Thresh}}.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Active: Thresh throws out his scythe in the target direction, becoming unable to move or attack while it is in flight.
The scythe catches the first enemy it hits, dealing them magic damage, stunning them for 1.5 seconds, and hooking the target for 1.5 seconds, during which the target is revealed and Thresh is unable to declare basic attacks. Hitting an enemy reduces the cooldown of Death Sentence by 3 seconds and slows Thresh by 20% for 1 second.
While the target is stunned, Thresh tugs at his scythe's chain twice over 0.8 seconds, pulling the target a short distance towards himself with each tug. After 0.5 seconds of hitting an enemy or instantly after hitting a minion or monster, Thresh can recast the ability to cast Deathly Leap while the target is hooked, doing so will cause him to stop tugging.
Recast: Thresh dashes to the hooked enemy within range, becoming able to attack again upon arrival. Thresh can cast any of his champion ability while in flight with the exception of Thresh's The Box.
skills.notes:
* '''Thresh''' will track the target if they change locations.
** He will dash to the target's previous location if the target is too far away or moves beyond the maximum tracking distance.
* '''Thresh''' will turn his facing direction towards the cast direction only after ''Death Sentence's'' cast is complete.
** If '''Thresh''' is facing '''more''' than 90{{degree}} away from the cast direction in either direction, he will turn to face ''exactly'' 90{{degree}} away from the cast direction over the cast time, then turn towards the cast direction when the missile is fired.
** If '''Thresh''' is facing '''less''' than 90{{degree}} away from the cast direction, he will keep his facing direction until the missile is fired.
** [http://web.archive.org/web/0/http://na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?p=33837947#post33837947 This prevents the enemy from knowing where exactly '''Thresh''' is aiming at before the cast animation is complete.]
*''Death Sentence'' triggers on-cast effects (such as {{tip|Spellblade}} and stacking {{ai|Force Pulse|Kassadin}}) once at the start of the cast, and once at the end of the cast. It may trigger on-cast effects a third time when casting ''Deathly Leap''.
** This is because a separate spell is cast to prevent '''Thresh''' from facing towards the target direction immediately, which is (incorrectly) flagged to trigger on-cast effects.{{bug}}
* ''Deathly Leap'' has a maximum cast range. If '''Thresh''' or his victim move too far away from one another, ''Death Sentence'' will show its cooldown prematurely, preventing ''Deathly Leap'' from being cast.
** This behaves similarly to a tether range.
** If '''Thresh''' is already outside the maximum range when the scythe lands and the ''hook'' is created, ''Death Sentence'' will not be on cooldown{{bug}}, however actually casting ''Deathly Leap'' will cause it to fizzle unless '''Thresh''' has walked into range again.
* While {{tip|ground|grounded}} or {{tip|root|rooted}} ''Death Sentence'' cannot be recast.
* Only ''Death Sentence's'' first chain tug puts the target {{tip|airborne}}. Outside the first ~{{fd|0.3}} seconds, the target is only stunned.{{bug}}
* ''Death Sentence'' will not {{tip|stun}} enemies that are {{tip|displacement immune}} or {{tip|cc-immune}} but the target will still be ''hooked'' and '''Thresh''' is still granted the ability to recast for his dash.
* '''Thresh''' will not tug at all if the {{tip|stun}} is not active on the target or if he used the recast.
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will block all of ''Death Sentence's'' effects, including the ''hook'' as well as prevent the cooldown reduction.
* ''Death Sentence's'' {{tip|stun}} duration is affected by {{tip|tenacity}} but the ''hook'' will always persist for {{fd|1.5}} seconds, unless the target uses a {{tip|cleanse|cleansing}} effect, in which case the ''hook'' is removed.
** ''Death Sentence's'' {{tip|stun}} will persist even if '''Thresh''' dies before the duration ends. The tug will not occur as '''Thresh''' is not alive.

skills.name: Dark Passage
skills.effect_radius: {{tip|cr|icononly = true}} {{tt|350|Shield granting radius}} / <!--{{tip|?|icononly = true}} -->{{tt|150|Lantern pickup radius, radius and range behaviour pending for test}}
skills.blurb: Thresh throws out a lantern that shields nearby allied Champions from damage. Allies can click the lantern to dash to Thresh.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Thresh''' throws his lantern to the target location which lands after {{fd|0.5}} seconds, lasting for 6 seconds or until he moves too far away from it, granting {{tip|sight}} of its surroundings.

'''Thresh''' and the first allied champion to come near the lantern are granted a {{tip|shield}} for 4 seconds. An ally can select the lantern while in proximity of it, {{tip|dash|dashing}} to '''Thresh''' and gaining the shield.
An ally cannot select the lantern while {{tip|immobilize|immobilized}}, {{tip|ground|grounded}}, or {{tip|silence|silenced}}.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Active: Thresh throws his lantern to the target location which lands after 0.5 seconds, lasting for 6 seconds or until he moves too far away from it, granting sight of its surroundings.
Thresh and the first allied champion to come near the lantern are granted a shield for 4 seconds. An ally can select the lantern while in proximity of it, dashing to Thresh and gaining the shield.
An ally cannot select the lantern while immobilized, grounded, or silenced.
skills.notes:
* The ally, while dashing, will track '''Thresh''' if he changes locations.
* The lantern is considered a unit and can be targeted by an allied {{si|Teleport}}, {{ai|Leap Strike|Jax}}, {{ai|Shunpo|Katarina}}, and {{ai|Safeguard|Lee Sin}}.
** It is {{tip|untargetable}} to enemies.
* The lantern's duration and maximum leash range are each displayed as a circle on the ground.
* ''Dark Passage'' is special cased to trigger {{ri|Guardian}}.

effects.str: • Shield Strength: (+ 1 per Thresh's Soul collected)

skills.name: Flay
skills.blurb: Thresh's attacks wind up, dealing more damage the longer he waits between attacks. When activated, Thresh sweeps his chain, knocking all enemies hit in the direction of the blow.
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Thresh's''' basic attacks deal {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}}, with the {{sti|{{as|AD}}}} ratio increasing based on the time spent not basic attacking enemies, up to 10 seconds.

{{sbc|Active:}} '''Thresh''' sweeps his chain around him and in a broad line in the target direction, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to enemies within the area, {{tip|airborne|knocking}} them 200 units toward the chain's direction, and afterwards {{tip|slow|slowing}} them for 1 second.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Passive: Thresh's basic attacks deal bonus magic damage, with the AD ratio increasing based on the time spent not basic attacking enemies, up to 10 seconds.
Active: Thresh sweeps his chain around him and in a broad line in the target direction, dealing magic damage to enemies within the area, knocking them 200 units toward the chain's direction, and afterwards slowing them for 1 second.
leveling:
{{st|Minimum Bonus Magic Damage|1 per {{ai|Damnation|Thresh|Soul}} collected {{as|(+ 0% AD)}}}}
{{st|Maximum Bonus Magic Damage|1 per {{ai|Damnation|Thresh|Soul}} collected {{as|(+ {{ap|100 to 200}}% AD)}}}}

st_slices: 1 per Thresh's Soul collected (+ 0% AD)
1 per Thresh's Soul collected (+ % AD)

skills.name: The Box
skills.blurb: A prison of walls that slow and deal damage if broken.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Thresh''' surrounds his location with a pentagon of spectral walls, each one lasting for up to 5 seconds. Walls break upon contact with an enemy champion, dealing them {{as|magic damage}} and {{tip|slow|slowing}} them by 99% for 2 seconds.
Enemy champions breaking any wall beyond the first take no damage and are {{tip|slow|slowed}} for only 1 second.
''Targets are immune to breaking a new wall for 1 second after breaking one.''
skills.descriptionHtml:
Active: Thresh surrounds his location with a pentagon of spectral walls, each one lasting for up to 5 seconds. Walls break upon contact with an enemy champion, dealing them magic damage and slowing them by 99% for 2 seconds.
Enemy champions breaking any wall beyond the first take no damage and are slowed for only 1 second.
Targets are immune to breaking a new wall for 1 second after breaking one.
skills.notes:
* ''The Box'' is always placed at the original cast location.
* ''The Box'' always uses [[quick cast]], regardless of player settings. <!-- It used to be direction cast, and then have the box face the target direction. Dunno if this change was intentional but I won't assume a bug here ~Caenen-->
** ''The Box'' always faces into the same direction (one of the walls is due North, and spreads West-East).
*** The cast indicator does not show this behavior.
* The corners of ''The Box'' are placed 400 units around '''Thresh'''.
** Each wall is {{fd|470.228}} units long.
** Each wall passes {{fd|323.607}} units from the center of ''The Box'' at the closest approach (ignoring its width).
** A pentagon has an angle of 72{{degree}} between each corner.
